184.heading: Draft Dodgers.
184.title: "Special Agent of the Federal Bureau of Investigation". 5 p. True Comics, no. 39
184.author: [No author]

SUMMARY: FBI Agent Steve Saunders goes to Arkansas, and his first case is bringing in a draft dodger, farmer Hurbie Rains. A battle with guns, shovels and axes ends with Hurbie wounded and the whole family in court. No motive for Hurbie's actions is given. 1. United States. Federal Bureau of Investigation. k.
